Rulings.Edison:
● If "Caius the Shadow Monarch" banishes a DARK you control, while you control no other cards, you can Summon this card.
● You can only activate 1 trigger effect in your hand that special summons itself per chain,
so you can't summon this card and "Tragoedia" in the same chain.
Rulings.Tengu:
● If "Caius the Shadow Monarch" banishes a DARK you control, while you control no other cards, you can Summon this card.
● This card's trigger activates after a card like

\ would stop applying it's effect provided it got destroyed by the battle. 
● You can only activate 1 trigger effect in your hand that special summons itself per chain,
so you can't summon this card and "Tragoedia" in the same chain.
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg

Rulings.Base:
1. If you have 2 or more "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" in your hand when you receive damage, you can only Special Summon one "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness".
2. If the effect that inflicts damage to your Life Points is Chain Link 2 or higher, you cannot activate the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness".
3. If your opponent activates an effect that destroys the only card on your side of the field and also inflicts damage to your Life Points, you can activate the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness". If the destroyed card has an effect that activates at this time, you can still activate the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness". The effect of the destroyed card and the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" will form a Chain.
4. If your opponent inflicts battle damage to your Life Points with a monster like "Airknight Parshath" or "Spirit Reaper", you can activate the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness". The effect of your opponent's "Airknight Parshath" or "Spirit Reaper" will be Chain Link 1 and the effect of your "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" will be Chain Link 2.
5. If you activate "Mystical Space Typhoon" and your opponent chains "Judgment of Anubis", if they destroy the only monster you control with its effect and inflict damage to your Life Points, you can start a new Chain by activating the effect of "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" if you don't control any cards.
6. If you inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points with a card effect and your opponent Special Summons "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness", when the damage inflicting effect of your opponent's "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" activates, you can chain the effect of "Cyber Dinosaur".
7. If you select an 'Emissary of Darkness Token' with "Shrink", its ATK becomes 0.

PSCT.Edison:
① When you take damage from a card in your opponent's possession: 
You can Special Summon this card from your hand (Activate and resolve only if you control no cards). 
②If you do, activate this effect, based on the type of damage:
● Battle Damage: Special Summon 1 "Emissary of Darkness Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Lv7/ATK ?/DEF ?). 
(Its ATK/DEF is equal to the amount of damage you took).
● Effect Damage: Your opponent takes damage equal to the amount of damage you took.
PSCT.Tengu:

If you do, activate this effect, based on the type of damage:

(Its ATK/DEF is equal to the amount of damage you took).
● Effect Damage: Your opponent takes damage equal to the amount of damage you took.

PSCT.Base:
When you take damage from a card in your opponent's possession: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You must control no cards to activate and to resolve this effect. If Summoned this way, activate the appropriate effect, based on the type of damage:
● Battle damage: Special Summon 1 "Emissary of Darkness Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 7/ATK ?/DEF ?). Its ATK and DEF are each equal to the amount of battle damage you took.
● Effect damage: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the amount of damage you took.
